-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Design system for Hypered.
--   
--   Design system for Hypered.
@package design-system
@version 0.0.0


-- | This file is generated by <tt>scripts/create-stories-hs.sh</tt>.
module Hypered.Stories

-- | <tt>stories</tt> a list of all Storybook examples. The first item is
--   the Welcome page.
stories :: [(String, String)]


-- | Define HTML code for the Hypered design system.
module Hypered.Html

-- | Generate both the normal and pretty-printed HTML versions.
generate :: FilePath -> Text -> (FilePath -> Html) -> IO ()

-- | Use this version of <a>generate</a> and pass it False to render
--   complete exemple pages (i.e. without including the wrapper to present
--   the design system components).
generate' :: FilePath -> Text -> Config -> (FilePath -> Html) -> IO ()
generateHtml :: Config -> FilePath -> FilePath -> Text -> Html -> IO ()
prettyHtml :: Config -> FilePath -> FilePath -> Text -> Html -> IO ()

-- | Same as prettyHtml but doesn't wrap the content to create a full
--   standalone HTML document.
partialHtml :: Config -> FilePath -> FilePath -> Text -> Html -> IO ()
data Font
IbmPlex :: Font
Inter :: Font
Font :: String -> Font
fontClass :: Font -> String
fontCss :: Font -> String
data Config
Config :: FilePath -> Font -> Bool -> Config
[cStaticPath] :: Config -> FilePath
[cFont] :: Config -> Font

-- | Choose True when rendering a component, False when rendering a
--   complete page.
[cAddWrapper] :: Config -> Bool
defaultConfig :: Config
mkRelativize :: FilePath -> FilePath -> FilePath

-- | This is the main wrapper. This is exposed as $ nix-shell --run "runghc
--   bin/hypered-guide.hs wrapper" and should match the content of
--   `pages/_app.js`.
document :: Config -> FilePath -> Text -> Html -> Html

-- | The main horizontal navigation component. It uses "flex
--   justify-between" so it is better to group its contained links with
--   <a>div</a>s. With a single <a>div</a>, they are all grouped on the
--   left. With two, the first is grouped to the left and the second to the
--   right. See
--   <a>https://hypered.github.io/design/storybook/?path=/story/navigation--navigation</a>
--   for examples.
nav :: Html -> Html

-- | Horizontal navigation at the top of a page.
navigation :: FilePath -> Html

-- | Horizontal navigation at the top of a page, at the same level as main
--   wrapper and footer.
navigationNoteed :: Html
navigationReesd :: Html

-- | Same as <a>navigationNoteed</a> but with links on the right, except
--   the first one.
navigationNoteed' :: Html
navigationTemplate :: Html

-- | Content wrapper, for a blog post, at the same level as navigation and
--   footer.
wrapPost :: Html -> MarkupM () -> Html

-- | The main content wrapper, at the same level as navigation.
wrap :: Html -> Html

-- | The footer, at the same level as both navigation and wrap.
footer :: Html -> Html

-- | The main content, as a left column.
section :: Html -> Html

-- | A right column, with a title and a list of links.
aside :: Html

-- | Green variant of a banner.
bannerGreen :: Html -> Html

-- | Yellow variant of a banner.
bannerYellow :: Html -> Html

-- | Red variant of a banner.
bannerRed :: Html -> Html
banner :: [Char] -> Html -> Html
buttonPrimary :: Html -> Html
buttonPrimaryDisabled :: Html -> Html
buttonSecondary :: Html -> Html
buttonSecondaryDisabled :: Html -> Html
buttonFullWidth :: Html -> Html
codeBlock :: Html
title :: Html
sidebarTitle :: Html -> Html
sidebarUL :: Html -> Html
sidebarLI :: Html -> Html
sidebarLink :: Html -> AttributeValue -> Html
sidebar :: (Foldable t, Foldable t1) => t1 (Html, t (Html, AttributeValue)) -> Html
exampleLoginForm :: MarkupM ()
exampleRegisterForm :: MarkupM ()
exampleResetForm :: MarkupM ()
exampleSidebar :: MarkupM ()
exampleSidePanel :: MarkupM ()

-- | Login form
--   <a>https://hypered.github.io/design/storybook/?path=/story/form--login</a>
loginForm :: Html

-- | Register form
registerForm :: Html

-- | Reset form
resetForm :: Html
